name: Meaning (Arbit)
description:
Sol is happy. She’s living with Chet, her high school sweetheart, and every day is full of warm cuddles and sweet kisses. If only those days could go on forever...

But when her estranged cousin writes to her, Sol learns she has less time than she thought. Poised to inherit the family business, her parents will do anything so she joins Fitzroy Foods.

A kinetic novel about a really cute couple (SolChet ♥) but also about family, the future, and deciding for yourself. 

Features

  • 8500 words, around 1-2 hours of playtime
  • Sprites, CGs, and a custom UI
  • Bonus artbook with a $3 or above donation, including game art, illustrations, and sketches

Credits

  • Music from Eric Matyas, www.soundimage.org
  • Background images edited from Unsplash

Content Warnings

  • Mentioned disownment/estrangement
  • Toxic parenting

Follow me on Twitter for updates on future projects!
